2994157032.itemDescription: Kill 20 enemies without taking damage from them.
2994157032.displaySource: All Guardians can fight, but only the truly skilled can face our greatest dangers and walk away unscathed.

2994157033.itemDescription: Kill 2 enemies at once with a Fusion Rifle, 20 times.
2994157033.displaySource: The technology used to create Fusion Rifles is volatile and open for experimentation. Push the limits to see what kind of trouble you can cause.

2994157034.displaySource: It is not enough to simply fight. Guardians must survive. Show the Vanguard you have what it takes to maintain your resolve against all threats, and you will be rewarded.

2994157035.itemDescription: Defeat Banuk in the "Sword of Crota" mission on the Moon with the Heroic modifier active.
2994157035.displaySource: Face down Banuk, spawn of all things nameless and forbidden.

2994157036.displaySource: Vanquish Sardok, custodian of the dread Shrine of Oryx.

2994157037.itemDescription: Defeat Zydron in the "Eye of a Gate Lord" mission on Venus with the Heroic modifier active.
2994157037.displaySource: Zydron protects the massive Vex portal at the apex of the Endless Steps. Find the portal, ascend the steps and kill the Gate Lord.

2994157038.itemDescription: Complete a Weekly Heroic or Nightfall Strike.
2994157038.displaySource: Greater challenges come with greater rewards.

2994157039.itemDescription: Complete any Strike with the Epic modifier active.
2994157039.displaySource: Every victory is a prize, but we only learn from those conflicts that challenge us. Test yourself against the unchecked power of our enemies.

3010934617.displaySource: The Fallen Servitor, Simiks-3, is attempting to plunder the secrets of the Archive. Get to Venus and stop it, before the Academy's secrets are lost forever.

3010934618.displaySource: As long as the Divisive Mind stands guard over the Black Garden we will never be safe. Find it, kill it.

3010934619.itemDescription: Defeat the Prohibitive Mind in the "Rising Tide" mission on Mars with the Heroic modifier active.
3010934619.displaySource: The Prohibitive Mind is a danger to any Guardians brave enough to challenge the Vex. Journey to Mars and destroy it.

3010934620.displaySource: Frigoris, an exiled Fallen Baron, has risked an assault on the Hive. It will be risky, but there may never be a better chance -- track him through the Hellmouth and eliminate him.

3010934623.displaySource: The Corrective Mind, an advanced Vex Hydra, has secured an area near the Waking Ruins on Venus. Destroy it.

Return to me when you are done."
